Dear GFF Fellows and friends,

We cordially invite you to our Qualification event and Fellows meeting on February 3 (afternoon) at the [GFF office](https://maps.app.goo.gl/HP6rvNDce6wyJqFN9) in Leiden (and remotely via Zoom). We start at 12:00 with lunch, the main program will be from 13:30 -17:30.

For details and registration, see [here](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfWehR1qhLdUYJ-VGZP1eGsMB5cjYwX5pE6xvXlYJmpD0AzCg/viewform).

We are very much looking forward to meeting you soon!

Kind regards,  
Gerhard (on behalf of Barbara)
